Package com.nuix.nx.sourceitem

Interface SourceItemVisitCallback

public interface SourceItemVisitCallback
Callback used by SourceItemVisitor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    visitSourceItem(nuix.SourceItem sourceItem)
    Called once for each allowed item.

  • Method Details

    • visitSourceItem

      boolean visitSourceItem(nuix.SourceItem sourceItem)
      Called once for each allowed item.
      Parameters:
      sourceItem - The source item being visited.
      Returns:
      True if children should be visited as well, false if children should not be visited.
